titleStmt.title: A character of the nevv Oxford libeller, in answer to his Character of London diurnall. Published according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for H.B. at the Castle in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Cleveland, John. The character of a London diurnall (Wing C4659).
Printed by Michael Spark. Cf. Madan.
In this edition line 7 of title lacks the article "a" preceding "London".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 11th. 1644"; the 5 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
